title: App Store, Apple Music and Other Services Experiencing Issues
content:
The App Store, Apple Books, Apple Music, ‌Apple Music‌ radio, iTunes Store, and iCloud Storage Upgrades are all experiencing downtime right now, according to Apple's System Status page.


Affected services may be slow or unavailable, and there are a number of complaints about the ‌App Store‌ and ‌Apple Music‌ on Twitter.

The outage began at 11:53 a.m. Pacific Time, and we'll update this article when Apple addresses the issue and the services are back up and functioning as normal.
This article, "App Store, Apple Music and Other Services Experiencing Issues" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums
author: Juli Clover
siteTitle: MacRumors: Mac News and Rumors - All Stories
